meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lorne Erdile Mary Leland Bob Chauls Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #953.

td.p: Lorne Erdile, a medical researcher from Baltimore, Maryland
Mary Leland, a computer scientist from Berkeley Heights, New Jersey
Bob Chauls, a composer & professor from Westlake Village, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $23,400)

tr.td: GOVERNMENT
WORD ORIGINS
ICE SKATING
SINGING CELEBRITIES
NEW YORK STATE
"POLE"s
